caeserCipher

Class Caesar

  • java.lang.Object
    • caeserCipher.Caesar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    caeserCipher.Cipher

    public class Caesar
extends java.lang.Object
implements caeserCipher.Cipher
    A class that allows the user to encode or decode a message with a Caesar Cipher
    Author:
    ruberVulpes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int length
      The length of the message to be encoded/decoded
      private java.lang.String message
      The message to be encoded/decoded
      private boolean preserveCapitals
      Flag used to signal whether or not to preserve capitalization
      private int shift
      The amount to shift the characters of the message
